attributes.action: Dissolve the current government under a vote of No Confidence
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: As the government policies and their implementation ride roughshod over the wishes and rights of the populace that voted them into power, also that the mishandling of the economy fly in the face of their manifesto promises of "No boom and bust under Labour" the ritual erosion of civil liberties of said populace with the proposed introduction of biometric ID cards and its gifting of sovereignity to the european mandarins

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
